content: complimentary pattern fright & delight hat design by mary pranica pattern no for use with 202443 woolstok worsted for use with woolstok worsted fright & delight hat design by mary pranica description skeletons and bats oh my this frightfully delightful hat uses one woolstok bundle and is perfect for the eerie season experience level gauge in charted pattern 22 sts and 28 rnds = 4 smaller circ ndl co 108 sts pm and join to work in the round being careful not to twist sts *k2 p2 repeat from * to end rnds 1-5 change to larger circ ndl k53 kfb k53 kfb k to end 110 sts next round work chart a work chart b work chart c cut yarn leaving an 8 tail thread tail through rem sts and pull to close step no 3 finishing weave in rem ends block as desired step no 4 care hand wash or dry clean wash in tepid water using a mild soap do not twist shape and dry flat on a towel special methods stranded color a method of color knitting in which two or more yarns are worked at the same time
